sentences.english: Place the multiplier in the beaker and fill with Heptane until multiplier is fully immersed.
sentences.chinese: 将倍增器放入烧杯中并倒入正庚烷直至浸没倍增器。

sentences.english: And they're immersed in an electrolyte made of positive and negative ions dissolved in a solvent.
sentences.chinese: 他们被浸没在正负离子溶于溶剂的电解液中。

sentences.english: Other things are complete submersion into the language.
sentences.chinese: 其他的东西都完全浸没到语言里。

sentences.english: The master is submerged in a nickel bath in which the metal stamper is grown on top of the master.
sentences.chinese: 母版被浸没与镍浴中，而金属压模在母版上面生长。

sentences.english: My heart is drenched in wine, but you'll be on my mind forever.
sentences.chinese: 我的心浸没在酒中，但你将永存于我心中。

sentences.english: Don't immerse ourself in this infliction too long.
sentences.chinese: 太长期不要浸没ourself在这处罚。

sentences.english: Long time ago, the world immerged itself with silence.
sentences.chinese: 世界早已浸没在一片沉寂之中。

sentences.english: And that's where the immersion heaters come in.
sentences.chinese: 这是浸没式加热器所要承担的任务。

sentences.english: The digits crashed all about me. I was submerged in infinity.
sentences.chinese: 数字在我四周哗哗落下，我浸没在无限之中。

sentences.english: Investigation on near-field optical data storage using solid immersion lens .
sentences.chinese: 利用固体浸没透镜的近场光学存储研究。

sentences.english: The crops were drowned by the heavy rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 庄稼被滂沱大雨浸没了。

sentences.english: A bird covered in oil flails in the water.
sentences.chinese: 一只浸没在泄漏的石油中的死亡的海鸟。

sentences.english: When it's dipped into the sea, plankton are trapped between them.
sentences.chinese: 被浸没在海水中以后，浮游生物会被困在网筛之间。

sentences.english: The oscillation of an air-filled double-layered spherical shell immersed in water was examined.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浸没于水中的双层球壳振动问题。

sentences.english: Radial distribution of the recovery factor was determined.
sentences.chinese: 得到自由和浸没冲击射流恢复系数的径向分布。
